name: Incontinuity
description:
> STAY FOCUSED

Who doesn't remember being challenged by those "spot-the-difference-pictures" in our childhood. We took this concept and put it into three dimensions. So go ahead, try it out by yourself. But stay focused, some incontinuities are hard to spot.

> HOW TO PLAY

To mark incontinuities between both worlds simply press E and highlight the corresponding object. To switch between both worlds, find the orange button and press E (see Tutorial).

> CREDITS

Code/Art: mawal, Riodsh

Made for the GMTK Jam 2021
